data: {"generalSituation":"The band of clouds covering the coast of Guangdong will thin out in the next couple of days. Meanwhile, the northeast monsoon will moderate slightly, the weather will improve gradually with temperatures rising progressively over the region. However, it will remain cool in the morning. Under the persistent influence of the dry northeast monsoon replenishment, the weather will be generally fine over southern China from the weekend to midweek next week. The temperature difference between day and night will be rather large.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251120","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"North force 4, force 5 offshore at first.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. Rather cool with one or two light rain patches in the morning.
